There's a stone monument. We'll be safe here!
Do you want to consume the bonfire set and rest?
Huh?　I don't have any of those.。
We'll consume one bonfire set, if that's all right.
I don't think we're gonna be able to open the locks here...
I still remember my grandma giving me flowers.
I'm gonna do something dangerous again.
Mr. Kerr, if anything happens to me, please take care of me, okay?
I won't do anything rash, okay?　I promise.
Come on, we have to be ready and punish him!
Oh, my God, they're not even worth talking about.
How dare you allow one little girl like her to enter?
After all, they are just lowly barbarians who target livestock and the elderly.
Was it impossible to lead, to guard... or...
Does this little girl have some kind of special ability?
I snuck in with a funny costume and dodged security.
I'm more than just a little girl there.
However, I would appreciate it if you refrained from interfering any further.
It's very efficient to finish a woman and sell her.
These days, it's more than costly and time-consuming drugs.
Rewrite your personality in an instant without fail.
He's busy researching brainwashing radio waves.
If you don't resist and give yourself up.
I'll let you go along with your fun research.
As a test subject, of course...
That sounds like a lot of fun research.
Oh!　You take my word for it!
You know how perverts remain perverts even after they're uncontrolled?
You know that the bathroom leads to a dangerous cave.
I blocked it up and used the leaking miasma to make everyone go crazy.
You've done a hell of a job!
You can't just spank me now!
The demon that lives deep in the cave.
I drove him back to the demon world.
The miasma won't come out anymore.
I don't think it's going to work out the way you want it to.
Hahaha!　You expect me to believe that ridiculous story?
Oh, my God, that was so funny. What I did.
You've got to be kidding me.
You're trying to scare me with lies.
You're about to become a guinea pig.
You have to come up with a more decent joke.
Hmm... you're pretty good at that.
But what happens when you administer this drug to a failing patient?
Damn it, you don't have enough medicine!
What the hell is this?　I can't accept this!
Out of the ordinary...!　That's impossible!　It's not supposed to happen!
This is a human being, and she's not even old enough to be a woman!
I don't mean to be rude... but I'm human.
You're the one who usually sees me as a tool!
Even the naked men who were trying to grab me.
He's really just a normal human being like me, you know?
You don't have to do this anymore.
I've made simple math mistakes too!
It must be!　There's not enough medicine!
Something that would bring more people to their knees.
It takes a huge amount of intelligence and drugs. ！！！！
Hey!　What are you doing?　Stop it!
I'll become a specimen myself and eliminate you!
A precise balance of countless medicinal herbs and drugs.
Seven days and seven nights of smelting with a special formula!
By injecting the drug through your veins, you'll be able to do that several times over!
This... is the ultimate drug that has been the result of long-term research!
It sounded like a line that would fail.
My assistants, if you'd come to your senses...
We've been drugged periodically while breathing in the miasma.
I was being manipulated to suit his needs.
If the miasma doesn't come pouring out, my friends and I will have to do a little more.
What we've done can never be atoned for, but...
I'm going to try to help as many people as I can.
There are still a lot of people out there who haven't come to their senses.
You don't seem to do anything bad anymore. You're okay, right?
Well, I guess we should go home.
